# GET /v1/appInfos/{id}/relationships/ageRatingDeclaration | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/appInfos/{id}/relationships/ageRatingDeclaration ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appInfos-_id_-relationships-ageRatingDeclaration)

-  GET /v1/appInfos/{id}/relationships/ageRatingDeclaration 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appInfos/{id}/relationships/ageRatingDeclaration

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appInfos-_id_-relationships-ageRatingDeclaration#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appInfos/{id}/relationships/ageRatingDeclaration
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appInfos-_id_-relationships-ageRatingDeclaration#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-appInfos-_id_-relationships-ageRatingDeclaration#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppInfoAgeRatingDeclarationLinkageResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appinfoageratingdeclarationlinkageresponse)`OK`

 Content-Type: application/json ` 400 Bad Request``[ErrorResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/errorresponse)`Bad Request`

[`Read age rating declaration`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appinfos-_id_-ageratingdeclaration)Get the age rating declaration for the app info.[`Modify an Age Rating Declaration`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/patch-v1-ageratingdeclarations-_id_)Provide age-related information so the App Store can determine the age rating for your app.
